summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 7th Avenue Southwest, from West Thistle Street to West Kenyon Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 14617 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
